channel.title: Kpop on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Kpop on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Box Office: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Sings to Estimated $17M-$18M in First Theatrical Win for Netflix
item.description: Since the streamer doesn’t report box office grosses, Comscore’s official weekend chart doesn’t include the special sing-along event. Instead, it shows ‘Weapons’ coming in No. 1 with $15.4 million.

item.title: Box Office: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Sings to Estimated $17M-$18M in First Theatrical Win for Netflix
item.description: Since the streamer doesn’t report box office grosses, Comscore’s official weekend chart doesn’t include the special sing-along event. Instead, it shows ‘Weapons’ coming in No. 1 with $15.4 million.

item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Review: Netflix’s Surprise Smash Is a Dazzlingly Animated, Infectiously Soundtracked Treat
item.description: Lee Byung-hun and Daniel Dae Kim are among the voice cast for one of the streamer’s most popular originals ever, a Sony-produced musical about a superstar girl group battling an evil boy band.
